arm_group.description: Patients who are having a sleep study done at NCH to diagnose sleep apnea.

brief_summary.textblock:
The investigators are proposing a study where the investigators would give a survey to the
      parents of patients having a sleep study. The survey would contain questions relating to
      symptoms of sleep apnea and then the investigators would correlate the parent answers to the
      results of the sleep study.

clinical_study.brief_title: Revisiting Parental Survey for Screening for Obstructive Sleep Apnea in Patients Undergoing Polysomnography

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Any patient coming for sleep study at Nationwide Children's Hospital and parent
             willing to fill out questionnaire.

          -  Children ages 3-18 years old regardless of sex or race.

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Parental refusal.

study_pop.textblock: Patients who are having a sleep study at NCH.

intervention.description: Parents or caregivers will complete a questionnaire regarding possible sleep apnea symptoms.

primary_outcome.description: Parents or caregivers will be asked to complete a questionnaire regarding possible symptoms related to sleep apnea.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective
